253750.「ちょうどよかった。\n あなたに 紹介したい人がいるんです。:
Just in time. I have someone I'd like to
introduce you to.

253751.「待ってくれ……。\n 起き抜けで アタマが さえないんだ。:
Wait a minute... I'm just out of bed and I
can't think straight.

253752.「くそ カラっぽか……。\n しょうがない もうひと眠りしよう。:
Damn, it's empty... I've got no choice but to
take another nap.

253753.「まったく あなたという人は……\n 紹介したい人がいると 言ったばかりでしょう:
You know, you... you just said you had someone I wanted to introduce you to! Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come
on!

253754.ファビエルは 寝ボケまなこの女性に\n<pc>のことを紹介した。:
Fabiel introduced the sleepy-eyed woman to
<pc>.

253755.「あー なんだ……私のことは\n そうだなぁ……クマリスと 呼んでくれ。\n 趣:
Uh, well... you can call me... Kumaris. I like
to eat and sleep.

253756.「フ……この 無気力な女性は\n 今後 あなたと行動を共にする……\n 言うなれ:
This lethargic woman will be your companion,
so to speak, from now on. Please get along
well with her.

253757.「無気力ね……。\n それよりも 相棒とは どういうことだ？:
You're lethargic... but more importantly, what
do you mean by partner?

253758.「言ったとおりです。私は このお方に\n ある お仕事を 依頼してましてね。:
It's as I said. I have hired him to do a
certain job for me.

253759.「今後 ますます 忙しくなるでしょうから\n 手伝ってあげてほしいのです。\n:
I know you're going to get busier and busier,
so I'd like you to help me out. It's a great
way to pass the time, isn't it?

253760.「ふん まあ いいだろう。\n ヒマつぶしくらいには なりそうだ。:
Hmm, well, that's okay. It'll be good to kill
some time.

253761.「よろしくな 相棒とやら。: Nice to meet you, buddy and all.

253762.「では お仕事の話に 入りましょう。\n あなたは こちらの石……\n 無垢なる:
Let's get down to business. You are familiar
with this stone, the Pure Gemstone, aren't
you?

253763.「この石……じつは 未完成でしてね。\n 完成させるには これを 偽りの世界への:
This stone... is, in fact, incomplete. To
complete it, it must be filled with love for
the false world.

253764.「偽りの世界への愛…… \n それは言うなれば この世界に生きる者たちの\n 偽:
Love for the false world... it is the World
Affirming the False World of The World
Affirmer, if you will.

253765.「愛だの心だの……正気か？\n そんな 目に見えないものを どうやって。:
Love, heart... are you insane? How can you say
that about something you can't even see?

253766.「フフ……あなたに眠る\n この世界への愛を 意識してみてください。:
Fufu... be aware of the love you have for this
world that lies dormant in you.

253767.「感じませんか？ 心をゆさぶる\n さざなみを……それが どこから届くのか。\n:
Don't you feel it? A ripple that shakes your
heart...where does it come from? Clear your
senses and focus your attention.

253769.「み 南の……い いや 南東かもしれない。\n その方角から 何かを感じる。\n:
I feel something from that direction. I sense
something from that direction. Perhaps around
Melun Watermill...

253770.「フム……そこで 何かが起こるのでしょう。\n ふたりで行って 確かめてくるので:
Hm...something will happen there. The two of
us will go there and find out.

253771.「バカな。ただの 気の迷いに過ぎない。\n 行っても……ムダ足になるだけだ。:
Nonsense. It's nothing more than a passing
fancy. Even if you go... you'll only be
wasting your time.

253772.「ムダ足に終わっても いいじゃないですか。\n どうせ ヒマつぶしなのでしょう？:
It doesn't matter if it ends up being a wasted
trip. It's just a way to kill time, isn't it?

253773.「こちらは 冒険者さんに 預けておきましょう。: Let's leave this with the adventurer.

253775.「まず 偽りのメルン水車郷へ 行ってください。\n そして この偽りの世界をめぐ:
First, go to the false Melun Watermill. Then,
go around this false world and fill the Pure
Gemstone with love.

253788.「おっ！ もう 帰ってきたか。\n 思ったより 早かったな。:
Whoa! You're back already. That was quicker
than I thought.

253789.「あのぉ……頼んでいた 極上麦は\n 手に入れて くださいましたか？<yesno:
Um...did you receive the Top Wheat I asked
for?<yesno><close>

253791.クレルは しょんぼりしている。\nやはり 極上麦を渡しますか？<yesno><c:
Krell is taking it down a notch. Would you
still give him Top Wheat?<yesno><close>

253792.クレルは しょんぼりしたままだ。\nやはり 極上麦を渡しますか？<yesno><:
Krell remains downcast. Would you still give
him Top Wheat?<yesno><close>

253794.「まあ！ ありがとうございます！\n さっそく 粉をひかなくちゃ。\n なんとい:
Well! Thank you! I'll have to powder them
right away. After all, freshness is essential!

253795.クレルは 水車小屋に 粉をひきにいった。: Krell went to the water cabin to make flour.

253796.そして 戻ってくると ひきたての小麦粉で\nパン生地を こねはじめた。:
When he returned, he began to knead bread
dough from freshly ground flour.

253797.クレルは 生地を こね終えると\n今度は かまどに火をいれて……:
Krell would finish kneading the dough
Now we put the fire in the fireplace

253798.ほどなくして パンを焼きあげた。: Not long after, he baked Bread.

253799.「おおー いい匂いがしてきたぞぉ。\n 今度こそ イケるんじゃないのか！:
Oh, it smells so good! I think we're gonna get
it this time!

253800.「よろしければ どうぞ。: If you like, you can go ahead.

253801.「うまい！ うまいよ クレル！\n これまでのも 充分 うまかったけど\n 今度:
Yum! It's good, Krell! Your old Bread was good
enough, but this is the best Bread I've ever
had!

253803.「こんな味では とても 村のみんなに\n 食べてもらえない。気に入ってもらえない:
With such a flavor, it's hard to get everyone
in the village to eat it. They won't like it.

253804.「あーあ ま～た 始まったよ……。\n クレルは 気にしすぎだってば。:
Oh, no, here we go again... Krell cares too
much.

253805.「うおーい ジャマするぜえ クレルさん。\n 今日のパンは まだ 焼きあがんねえ:
Hey, you're in my way, Mr. Krell. Bread isn't
baked yet?

253806.「ふおーん！ 焼きあがってるでねえか！\n 今すぐ 分けてくれろ。待ちわびすぎて:
Whoo-hoo! It's baked! Give it to me now. I've
been waiting so long, my stomach and back are
almost stuck together.

253808.「どうもこうも ねえだ。ラスカが お試しだって\n あんたのパンを 村で配ってた:
It's no big deal. Raska gave away your Bread
in the village as a trial.

253809.「ナイショで そんなことを！？\n どれもこれも 失敗作なのに……。:
You did that in secret? I mean, all of them
are failures, but...

253810.「へへっ。ひとりじゃ 食べきれなかったから\n 村のみんなに 分けてあげたんだ。:
Hehe. I couldn't finish it all by myself, so I
shared it with everyone in the village. It was
very popular.

253811.「それなら 持っていくがいい。\n たった今 焼きあがったばかりだしな。: Then take it with you. It's just baked.

253812.「そんな……。\n まだまだ 村のみなさんに\n お出しできるほどの 味ではない:
No... it's not good enough to serve to the
whole village!

253813.「ウソだな。他者の評価を怖れ\n 味を追求することに 逃げてるだけだろ。\n …:
That's a lie. You're just running away from the pursuit of taste because you're afraid of what others will think. I'm sure you're aware
of that.

253814.「でも この程度じゃ ダメなんです。\n 私は 村のみなさんに ひどいことを……:
But this is not enough. I did a terrible thing
to the villagers... so I must compensate with
my own taste!

253815.「魔女グレイツェルが 村にしたことは忘れない。\n でも それと これとは別。だ:
I will never forget what the Witch Gretzel did
to our village. But that's different. Because
I'm a big Fan Fan of your Bread.

253816.「そうそう！\n ほかにも 待ってる人間がいるんだ。\n 毎日 じゃんじゃん 焼:
Yes, yes! There are other humans waiting for
you. Don't stop burning the food every day!

253817.「あんたは メルサンディ村の 一員だ。\n 足りない物があったら 言ってくれ。\:
You are a member of Melsandy Village. Let me
know if you need anything. I want to thank you
for the Bread.

253818.「あ ありがとうございます！\n どうぞ お好きなだけ 召し上がってください。:
Oh, thank you! Go ahead, have as much as you
like.

253819.「よいものだな。たがいが たがいを許し\n 受けいれる光景 というものは……。\:
It's a good thing, isn't it? The sight of two people forgiving and accepting each other is the kind of grass that I would like to
protect.

253821.「よもや 愛が 集まったというのか！？\n これが ファビエルの言っていたこと…:
You mean to tell me that love has gathered?
This is what Fabiel was talking about...

253822.「次は 南東……セレドの町だ。\n あちらの方角から 愛の さざなみを感じる。\:
Next, to the southeast, the Town of Celed. I
can feel the ripples of love coming from that
direction. Let's go there, shall we, partner?

253823.「みんな よく 集まってくれたわね。: Thank you all for coming together.

253824.「聞いてのとおり 私たちの名誉子供が\n あちら側に戻った セリクの声を\n が:
As you can hear, our honorary child is back on
the other side, doing his best to bring
Selik's voice to us.

253826.「すごいや！ セリクと お話しできるの？: Oh, my God! You can talk to Selik?

253827.「残念だけれど お話しまでは ムリね。\n でも これに記録された セリクの伝言:
I'm sorry, but I can't talk to you. But we can
all listen to Selik's message recorded on
this.

253828.「それじゃ 始めるわ。\n 終わるまで 静かにすること。いいわね？:
Then we'll begin. Now, we're going to be quiet
until this is over. Okay?

253829.「……ひさしぶりだね みんな。: It's been a while, hasn't it, everyone?

253830.「あれから 無事 石化の病を治せたんだけど\n 手足が 思うように動かなくてね…:
I've been cured of my petrification, but I
can't move my arms and legs as well as I'd
like.

253831.「それでも どうにか\n トゥーラを 弾けるようになったんだ。:
Still, somehow I managed to learn to play the
Torban.

253832.「聞き苦しいかも しれないけど\n ぜひ みんなに聞いてほしい。\n これが 今:
I know it may be hard to hear, but I want
everyone to hear this. This is who I am now.
Okay, I'll play...

253833.「くやしいけど これが 精一杯なんだ。\n でも いつか必ず みんなに聞かせた\:
I'm sorry, but this is the best I can do. But
one day, I will definitely be able to produce
that sound that I made you all hear.

253834.「その時がきたら また 演奏を届けるよ。\n 名残惜しいけど このへんにしておこ:
When the time comes, I'll bring you another performance. I'm sorry to leave this behind, but I'll leave it at that. Take care,
everyone. See you soon...

253835.「ねえ リズ。もう１回 聞こうよ。: Hey, Liz. Let's hear it one more time.

253836.「いいわね。私も 聞きたいし……。: That's nice. I'd love to hear...

253839.「やだやだ！ もう１回 聞きたいよ！: No, no, no! I wanna hear it again!

253840.「みんな。壊れてしまったのは 残念だけど\n セリクは こうも言っていたよ。\n:
Guys. It's too bad it's broken, but Selik said
he'd play for us again. He said he'll bring us
another performance when he gets better.

253841.「そうね。私たちにできるのは 時がくるまで\n 助けあいながら ここで 待ってい:
Yeah, I guess so. All we can do is wait here,
helping each other, until the time is right...
okay, guys?

253843.「……わかっているのか？\n いたずらに 生者の世界と 交流しようとすれば\n:
Do you understand? If you try to interact with
the living world unnecessarily, you will only
increase your despair.

253844.「イヤでも 己の死を意識させられる。:
You are reluctantly made aware of your own
mortality.

253845.「短い間だけど ここで 共に過ごした仲間が\n 向こうで 元気にやっていると 知:
To know that our companions are doing well
over there, even if only for a short time? I'm
sure they'll be there for us.

253846.「私なら……嫉妬で 狂いそうになる。: I would go crazy with jealousy.

253847.「セリクはね……最初 向こうに戻るのを\n 拒否していたのよ。元のように トゥー:
Selik...at first he refused to go back. He
didn't know if he would ever be able to play
the Torban the way he used to.

253849.「困難に立ちむかい 夢を つかもうとする\n セリクが……大人になれない 私たち:
Selik's determination to face challenges and
grasp the dream gives hope to those of us who
can't grow up.

253850.「気高いな 貴公は。: You're a noble man, you know.

253851.「だって 私は セレドの女王だもの。: Because I am the Queen of Celed.

253852.「ン？ 今度は アラハギーロ王国の方から\n 愛のさざなみを 感じるぞ……。\n:
Hmm? Now I feel the ripples of love coming
from the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro... buddy. I
think I'll call it a night.

253854.「相棒……これを 見ろ。\n 『大魔王印のシャイニーメロン』と あるぞ。:
Buddy... look at this. It says "Shiny Melon
with Great Demon King's Seal."

253855.「わざわざ 隠していたのは\n 作りかけだからか……？:
Did they go to the trouble of hiding it
because they were still making it?

253856.「今の なに～？\n ぴかーって 光ってなかった？: What was that? Wasn't it glowing?

253857.「わぁ これ これー。\n 私が探してた シャイニーメロン！:
Wow, this, this. The Shiny Melon I've been
looking for!

253858.「……変だよねぇ。さっき 探したときは\n なーんにも なかったのに……。:
That's strange. When I looked for it earlier,
I couldn't find anything...

253859.「ま いっか。さっそく お城に持ち帰って\n みんなで 味見しなきゃ。:
Oh well. I'll have to take it back to the
castle and give it a taste.

253861.「かつての大魔王が 作りかけのまま\n 放置したものを 無理に暴きだしただけだ。:
I have only forced myself to uncover what the
former Great Demon King left in the process of
creation. In other words, it's like a phantom.

253862.「そんなぁ……。\n ねえ なんとか ならない？: Oh no... hey, can't you do something?

253863.「あきらめろ。うまいモノなら\n ほかに いくらでもあるだろう。:
Give it up. There are plenty of other good
food out there.

253864.「ありふれた おいしさじゃ ダメだよ。\n 誰も 味わったことのない\n びっく:
It's not enough to have a common taste. It has
to be an amazing taste that no one has ever
tasted before!

253865.「うまかろうが まずかろうが\n この世界にあるものは みんな 偽物だ。:
Whether good or bad, everything in this world
is a fake.

253866.「偽物とか本物とか そんなの 関係ないと思う。\n おいしいものを 食べたら\n:
Fake or real, I don't think it matters. Anyone
who eats delicious food will smile.

253867.「私は アラハギーロの リーダーだから\n みんなを 笑顔にするの！:
I am the leader of Al-Ahagiro, and I make
everyone smile!

253868.「みんなの笑顔が 見たいのーっ！！: I want to see your smiling faces!

253869.「えへへ 見て見て～！\n シャイニーメロン 採れちゃったよ！: Hehehe, look at this! I picked Shiny Melons!

253871.「ほら 本物だよ。ちゃんと 触れるよ。: Look, it's real. You can touch it.

253872.「こっちのアラハギーロを 守るって\n カレヴァンさんに 約束したんだ。:
I promised Kalevan that I would protect
Al-Aharagiro.

253873.「でも 守るって どういうことなんだろうって\n ずっと 悩んでた……。:
But I've always wondered what it means to
protect...

253874.「それでね 私が出した答えが コレ！\n アラハギーロを盛りあげるための 特産品:
So, here's my answer! A special product to
make Al-Ahagiro more exciting. This should
bring a smile to everyone's face!

253875.「アラハギーロを 守るっていうのは\n きっと……みんなの笑顔を 守ることなんだ:
To protect Al-Ahagiro is surely to protect the
smiles on everyone's faces.

253876.「なかなか どうして……\n 貴公は 指導者の器だな。: You are a leader in your own right.

253877.<center>ふたりとも よく やりましたね。\n無垢なる原石は 愛で 満たさ:
You both did well. The Pure Gemstone seems to
have been filled with love.

253878.<center>ココラタの浜辺に お戻りください。\n今こそ 破魂の審判について:
Please return to Cocolata Beach. Now is the
time to talk about the judgement of Souls.

253879.「……えっ ふたりとも どうしたの？\n ぼけーっと しちゃって……。:
What's wrong with both of you? We're both
spaced out...

253880.「今のが 聞こえなかったのか？\n ……いや いい。: Did you not hear that? No, it's okay.

253882.「私も 帰るよ。\n はやく みんなに メロンを見せなきゃ。:
I'm going home, too. I have to show my melon
to everyone.

253883.「ああ お帰りなさい。\n さっそくですが 無垢なる原石を こちらに。:
Ah, welcome back. I'll get right to it. Pure
Gemstone here.

253885.「これだけの愛が 込められていれば\n ヒズミを中和する 護りの手のチカラを\n:
With this much love, it will manifest the
power of the protective hand to neutralize the
hissing.

253886.「ヒズミ？ 護りの手？\n 何を言っているんだ……。:
Hizumi? Hand of protection? What are you
talking about...

253887.「……もろもろの疑問に 答えるため\n いよいよ かの 破魂の審判について\n:
To answer all your questions, let me explain
the Judgement of Souls.

253888.「破魂の審判とは……\n 言うなれば この偽りの世界の\n 存亡をかけた 戦いの:
The Judgement of Souls is, if you will, the
ritual of the battle for the existence of this
false world.

253889.「世界を守る意志を 持つ者……護りの手。\n 滅ぼさんとする意志を 持つ者……滅:
He who has the will to protect the world...the hand of protection. He who has the will to destroy...the hand of destruction. They are
divided into two and fight.

253890.「滅びの手は 破壊神を召喚するために\n 世界に ヒズミを散りばめ\n 対する護:
The Hand of Doom scatters hizmis around the
world to summon the God of Destruction, while
the Hand of Protection erases them.

253891.「闘争の末 破壊神が召喚されれば 世界は滅び\n 召喚を食い止められれば この世:
If the God of Destruction is summoned after the struggle, the world will be destroyed, and if the summoning is stopped, it will be
protected and spared from destruction.

253892.「滅ぶだと？ そんな 危険な儀式をする理由が\n どこに あるというんだ。今すぐ:
Perish? What reason could you possibly have
for performing such a dangerous ritual? Stop
it now!

253893.「ご存じでしょうが この偽りの世界は\n 創造主も消え 未完成の場所も 多い……:
You see, in this false world, where the Creator is gone and many places are incomplete, existence itself is highly
unstable.

253894.「このまま 放置すれば 隣接する他の世界にも\n 様々な悪影響を およぼしかねな:
If left unchecked, it could have a variety of
negative effects on other adjacent worlds.

253895.「だからこそ 審判を経て 偽りの世界を\n 残すべきか否か 決めなければならない:
That's why we have to go through judgment to
decide whether or not we should leave the
false world behind.

253896.「……理不尽 きわまりないな。\n 聞きたくなかったよ そんな話。:
That's unreasonable. I didn't want to hear
that.

253897.「滅びの手が散りばめる ヒズミは\n 世界のほころびを 加速させるばかりか\n:
The hizmis scattered by the hand of destruction not only accelerate the fraying of the world, but are themselves the trigger that
summons the God of Destruction.

253898.「対する護りの手は この護り手の秘石を使い\n ヒズミを消していく……。おふたり:
The Secret Guardians will use the Secret Guardians' Stone to eliminate the hizumis... With the cooperation of the two of you,
preparations are now in place.

253899.「護りの手の選定者たる 私は\n こたびの破魂の審判の\n 護りの手として あな:
I, the Selector of the Hand of Protection,
choose you to be the Hand of Protection for
this Judge of Souls.

253900.「また そのパートナーたる 護りの盾は\n クマリスさん あなたにお願いしたい。:
I would also like to ask you, Mr. Kumaris, to
be my partner and shield of protection.

253901.「私を 巻き込まないでくれ。\n 面倒は ごめんだ。:
Don't drag me into this. I don't want any
trouble.

253903.「その場合 護りの手が たったひとりで\n 滅びの手と そのパートナーである 滅:
In that case, the Hand of the Protector alone
must take on the Hand of Perdition and its
partner, the Sword of Perdition...

253904.「フン。人の罪悪感に つけこむか……。\n ずいぶんな 態度じゃないか。:
Hmm. Taking advantage of people's guilt...
that's quite an attitude you have.

253905.「さて……前に あなたが会った\n メドナムですが 彼は 滅びの手の選定者。\n:
Now... the Mednam you met before, he is the
selector of the Hand of Perdition. From what
he says and does, the selection must be over.

253906.「破魂の審判の開幕は 間近です。\n 偽りの世界の行く末は\n あなたがたの 双:
The Judgement of Souls is about to begin. The
fate of the false world rests on your
shoulders.

253907.「言わば この世界に生きる者\n すべての代表なのです。健闘を期待します。:
In a manner of speaking, they represent all of
us who live in this world. I wish you the best
of luck.

253908.「そうそう。こちらは 今回のお礼です。\n どうぞ お受け取りを……。:
Oh, yes. This is for this time. Please
accept...

253909.「新たなヒズミの発生が\n 破魂の審判 開幕の合図です。\n 時が来たら お知ら:
The outbreak of new hizumis will signal the
opening of the Judge of Souls. We will let you
know when the time comes.

259567.「ここでも 愛が集まったか……。\n 子供たちは 偽りなく ここでの暮らしを\n:
So much love has been gathered here as well...
the kids seem to be affirming life here
without false pretenses.

259568.「だが 私とて 見知った人間が 滅びに\n 巻き込まれるサマなど 想像したくもな:
But I, for one, can't imagine any human I know
being caught in the middle of that
destruction. Fine...I'll take your shield.
